Title: Out o' Time
Plot: When his plea for an expedited return to solitary goes on deaf ears, Miguel takes matters into his own hands. Glynn finds out who raped his daughter. Hill gets sent to the hole. The boxing finals match ends in tragedy. A hack makes an exit...and an impression .....by leaving a holiday gift for an inmate.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, drug use & offensive language
GuestStars: Kevin Conway, Michael Hyatt, Yura Lee, Male Baby Alexander, Otto Sanchez, Kevin Conway
